doc.field: 2 gelatin silver prints, 10 1/2 x 13 1/2 in., mounted, of New York street life. One portrays children playing street games in Harlem; the other portrays a barefoot man sleeping on a bench, covered with a newspaper with World War II headlines. Both are signed and dated by the photographer.

Wright, Paula >> 2 gelatin silver prints, 10 1/2 x 13 1/2 in., mounted, of New York street life. One portrays children playing street games in Harlem; the other portrays a barefoot man sleeping on a bench, covered with a newspaper with World War II headlines. Both are signed and dated by the photographer.
